addResult.name: addResult
addResult.short_desc: Adds the specified result to the report.

setParameters.name: setParameters
setParameters.short_desc: Runtime parameters to configure the report behaviour.

setResults.name: setResults
setResults.short_desc: Sets the given results on this report.

getResults.name: getResults
getResults.short_desc: Returns all results currently compiled for the report.

getSettings.name: getSettings
getSettings.short_desc: Returns an array of ISetting instances that match the given criterias from the results of this report.

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: string or array of group names settings should match, the default null matches always

getSettingsAsArray.name: getSettingsAsArray
getSettingsAsArray.short_desc: Returns an array of associative arrays for each ISetting instance that matches the given criterias (from the results of this report).
getSettingsAsArray.hint_desc: of associative arrays for each ISetting instance that matched

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: string or array of group names settings should match, the default null matches always

getCachableSettings.name: getCachableSettings
getCachableSettings.short_desc: Returns an array of cachable ISetting instances that match the given criterias from the results of this report.

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: string or array of group names settings should match, the default null matches always

getCachableSettingsAsArray.name: getCachableSettingsAsArray
getCachableSettingsAsArray.short_desc: Returns an array of associative arrays for each cachable ISetting instance that matches the given criterias (from the results of this report).
getCachableSettingsAsArray.hint_desc: of associative arrays for each ISetting instance that matched

groups.name: groups
groups.short_desc: string or array of group names settings should match, the default null matches always
